nodes.text: Subject 13 Confinement was a Rakatan vault located in the Cells of the Lords of the Infinite in the the Tomb, an ancient prison on the planet Belsavis. It contained the mind prison in which Subject 13 was kept prisoner, and during the invasion of Belsavis, the Sith Empire attempted to free Subject 13.
Subject 13 Confinement appears as a location on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, and is the site of the Imperial mission "Subject 13."
